Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells and transgenic mice expressing the SNCA p.A53T mutation.

Readout description.Description: Altered alpha-synuclein aggregation and increased toxicity observed in transgenic mice.

Controls.Description: Wild-type HEK293 cells and mice used as controls.
SNCA knockout mice used as controls.

Statistical Methods.Description: Used to compare differences in protein aggregation across groups.

Thresholds.Abnormal: Significantly increased aggregation in mutant models

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells and transgenic mice expressing the SNCA p.A53T mutation.

Readout description.Description: Increased alpha-synuclein levels in mutant models compared to wild-type.

Controls.Description: Wild-type HEK293 cells and mice used as controls.
SNCA knockout mice used as controls.

Statistical Methods.Description: Used to compare alpha-synuclein levels between mutant and wild-type groups.

Thresholds.Abnormal: 20% or higher increase in mutant models

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells and transgenic mice expressing the LRRK2 p.G2019S mutation.

Readout description.Description: Increased LRRK2 kinase activity in mutant models.

Controls.Description: Wild-type HEK293 cells and mice used as controls.
LRRK2 knockout mice used as controls.

Statistical Methods.Description: Used to compare kinase activity across groups.

Thresholds.Abnormal: Significantly increased activity in mutant models

Material used.Material Name: HEK293 cells and PINK1 knockout mice
Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells and PINK1 knockout mice.

Readout description.Description: Reduced mitochondrial respiration rates in PINK1 mutant models.

Controls.Description: Wild-type HEK293 cells and mice used as controls.
PINK1 knockout mice used as controls.

Statistical Methods.Description: Used to compare mitochondrial respiration rates across groups.

Thresholds.Abnormal: 30% or greater reduction in mutant models

Material used.Material Name: HEK293 cells and DJ-1 knockout mice
Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells and DJ-1 knockout mice.

Readout description.Description: Reduced DJ-1 enzymatic activity in mutant models.

Controls.Description: Wild-type HEK293 cells and mice used as controls.
DJ-1 knockout mice used as controls.

Statistical Methods.Description: Used to compare DJ-1 enzymatic activity between mutant and wild-type groups.

Thresholds.Abnormal: Significantly reduced activity in mutant models
